mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_field (dic_id, zh_name, en_name, field_type, es_mapping_type) VALUES (#{dicId}, #{zhName}, #{enName}, #{fieldType}, #{esMappingType})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_field SET dic_id = #{dicId}, zh_name = #{zhName}, en_name = #{enName}, field_type = #{fieldType}, es_mapping_type = #{esMappingType} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, dic_id AS dicId, zh_name AS zhName, en_name AS enName, field_type AS fieldType, es_mapping_type AS esMappingType FROM t_field WHERE en_name = #{enName} AND dic_id = #{dicId}
